Pre-Game Insights: The St. Louis Cardinals and the New York Yankees meet Saturday in MLB action from Yankee Stadium.
This will be the second installment in a three-game series.
The starting pitcher for the Cardinals on Saturday will be Kyle Gibson, who is 7-6 with a 4.54 ERA in 25 starts.
The starting pitcher for New York on Saturday will be Will Warren, who is 0-2 with a 9.68 ERA in the first four starts of his MLB career.
Six of the Yankees' last seven games against NL Central opponents have gone OVER the total runs line.
Four of the Cardinals' last five games as road underdogs have gone UNDER the total runs line.
